thread.title: Valdez gets ITC papers before Thailand debut
thread.title_full: Valdez gets ITC papers before Thailand debut

title: Valdez gets ITC papers before Thailand debut
text: INQUIRER.net / 04:11 PM January 29, 2017 Alyssa Valde flashes wide smile. Photo by Marc Reyes Alyssa Valdez’s Thailand League career has officially began when she received her transfer papers hours before her first match with 3BB Nakornnont. According to a report on Fox Sports Philippines, Valdez was in her team locker room preparing for a match against King-Bangkok VC when her International Transfer Certificate arrived. Valdez has had a storied career in the Philippines winning two UAAP titles with Ateneo and three MVP plums. ADVERTISEMENT She’s also won several individual and team awards in the Shakey’s V-League and represented the Philippines in the AVC Asian Under-23 championship.
